query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Dynamical characterisation of selected seamounts/islands/shelf-break systems in the tropical Atlantic and implications for conservation efforts
result.description: The report will describe the physical forcing of ecosystems in different seamountsislandsshelfbreak regions in the tropical Atlantic and its variability onintraseasonal to seasonal timescales Analyses will involve observations and regional numerical modelling

result.title: Large-scale physical drivers of climate variability and extremes, including marine heatwaves, that affect ecosystem variability, change and stability
result.description: Report describing the large-scale physical drivers of climate variability and extremes, including marine heatwaves, that affect ecosystem variability, change and stability. This report will detail the progress achieved in Task 7.1. and also provide a basis for D7.2.

result.title: Phytoplankton biomass, primary production and size structure
result.description: Report describing the observed spatial and temporal seasonal distributions of phytoplankton biomass primary production and size structure It will also include an analysis based on both observations and experiments of the relationship betweenenvironmental drivers and phytoplankton size structure and primary productivity

result.title: Physical processes in tropical upwelling regions
result.description: The report will identify and characterize physical drivers of upwelling variability within the different regions of the eastern tropical Atlantic and will address possible responses under climate change. It will include the analysis of different field campaigns.
